TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ClientBase<TChannel> : IDisposable, System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject where TChannel : class
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ClientBase`1<class TChannel> extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class ClientBase(Of TChannel) Implements ICommunicationObject, IDisposable
generic <typename TChannel> where TChannel : classpublic ref class ClientBase abstract : IDisposable, System::ServiceModel::ICommunicationObject

span.span: The channel to be used to connect to the service.

summary.span: 提供用來建立可呼叫服務之 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用戶端物件的基底實作。

span.span: Provides the base implementation used to create Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client objects that can call services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充 類別，以建立可用來連接服務的自訂 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端物件。Extend the class to create a custom [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client object that can be used to connect to a service. 一般而言，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]這類用戶端的基底類別擴充工具[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)代替您。Typically, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client base class is extended by a tool such as the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) on your behalf. 如需範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。For an example, see the Example section. 偏好將物件用於介面及 類別的開發人員可快速輕鬆使用 類別。The class can be used quickly and easily by developers who prefer objects to the use of the interfaces and the class. 在所有情況下，這個類別都會包裝或公開 類別和 介面的方法與功能。In all cases this class wraps or exposes the methods and functionality of the class and the interface. 如同使用 類別時，在進行任何呼叫或呼叫 之前，您可建立類別並變更端點、通道處理站或安全性資訊。As when using the class, you can create the class and modify the endpoint, channel factory, or security information prior to making any calls or calling . [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [WCF 用戶端概觀](~/docs/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview.md)和[使用 WCF 用戶端存取服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client.md)。 [WCF Client Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview.md) and [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client.md). 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 中，而不是解構函式中。Put your clean-up code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非參考成員，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用完成項，但如果您要加入完成項，則應隱藏建置警告並從 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 呼叫 和完成項本身，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)擴充類別來建立[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]用戶端類別。The following code example shows how the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) extends the class to create a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client class. [!code-csharp[ClientBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientbase/cs/clientbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClientBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientbase/vb/clientbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來從應用程式組態檔中的端點資訊建立 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端物件。Use to create a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client object from the endpoint information in the application configuration file. 建構函式的主要功能為建立 ，其中型別參數為目標服務合約的型別。The main function of the constructor is to create a where the type parameter is the type of the target service contract.

summary.span: 使用應用程式組態檔中的預設目標端點，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default target endpoint from the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請使用此建構函式建立 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端物件以叫用服務。Use this constructor to create a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client object to invoke a service. 這個建構函式會使用型別參數做為應用程式組態檔中的目標合約以及繫結程序和位址資訊。This constructor uses the type parameter as the target contract and the binding and address information from the application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明用戶端如何在擴充 `SampleServiceClient` 類別的 類別中，使用此建構函式。The following code example shows how a client uses this constructor in a `SampleServiceClient` class that extends the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當服務合約需要回呼服務執行個體時，請使用此建構函式。Use this constructor when the service contract requires a callback service instance. 目標端點是從應用程式組態檔中的型別參數和資訊所建構。The target endpoint is constructed from the type parameter and information in the application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個具有 `SampleDuplexHelloClient` 類別的建構函式，傳遞接聽來自服務之訊息的回呼物件。The following code example shows how to use this constructor with a `SampleDuplexHelloClient` class to pass a callback object that listens for messages from the service. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來判斷目標端點資訊的名稱的應用程式組態檔中的端點 (尋找即可找到目標值`name`屬性的用戶端[<端點>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)項目) 及指定的位址。Use this constructor to determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element) and the specified address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來傳遞可實作目標服務之回呼合約的服務物件，然後透過用戶端應用程式組態檔來決定目標端點資訊。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the client application configuration file. 目標值藉由尋找位於`name`屬性的用戶端[<端點>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)項目。The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element.

summary.span: 傳回服務的新通道。

span.span: Returns a new channel to the service.

returns.span: 型別為服務合約的通道。

span.span: A channel of the type of the service contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回由內部通道處理站所建立的通道。Returns the channel created by the inner channel factory. 此處應該會發生 擲回的例外狀況。Exceptions thrown by can be expected here.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DisplayInitializationUI() cil managed

summary.span: 如果需要使用者介面來初始化通道才能使用，會先指示該通道顯示使用者介面。

span.span: Instructs the inner channel to display a user interface if one is required to initialize the channel prior to using it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果內部通道需要使用者互動才能建構通道，請呼叫 方法。Call the method if the inner channel requires user interaction prior to constructing the channel. 例如，若使用者必須輸入使用者名稱與密碼來保護通道安全，呼叫此方法即可叫用該自訂 。For example, if a user must enter a username and password to secure the channel, that custom can be invoked by calling this method.

Docs.summary:
提供實作事件架構非同步模式的支援。
Provides support for implementing the event-based asynchronous pattern. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]如需此模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件架構非同步模式概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)。 this pattern, see [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫 `userState` 時，可以在 參數中提供 GUID 或雜湊程式碼等唯一值，當每個作業完成時，事件處理常式就可以判斷哪一個作業執行個體引發了完成事件。Provide a unique value, such as a GUID or hash code, in the `userState` parameter for each call to , and when each operation is completed, your event handler can determine which instance of the operation raised the completion event.
